thread.section_title: Hotel Magellan - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A good, quiet and inexpensive hotel
thread.title_full: A good, quiet and inexpensive hotel - Review of Hotel Magellan, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Martin D
title: A good, quiet and inexpensive hotel
text:
We have used this hotel four or five times, always with satisfaction. It is not in the hub of the city, but the Metro (Porte de Champerret) and buses are handy, and the Etoile is a 15 minute walk away. Clean rooms, good breakfasts, excellent staff.
Room Tip: The rooms are not large, but they are pleasant. See more room tips
